short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring Zoom's Post Attendee page to life with the addition of eyes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're one of the many people with an accumulating number of Post Attendee tabs, bring them to life with the addition of eyes that will follow your mouse cursor around the page.
